website_summaries.verdict: Most of those who have tried the Brooks Transcend 4 felt that it was a great update to a series that has provided maximum support. Its performance as a road running show was lauded, as well. The general feedback for this model was positive. Conversely, there were some who weren’t able to acclimate well to this update, noting some of their problems with it.
pros: Many runners described the Brooks Transcend 4 as a comfortable shoe for their activities
A number of testers noted that the cushioning system in this model was an improvement over the previous iteration
The color schemes of this version were appreciated by purchasers who wrote that they were appealing, but not distracting
The shoe’s toe box was roomy enough to accommodate natural toe-splay, according to those who have tried it
Some runners have reported that this shoe was able to prevent the exacerbation of plantar fasciitis
A reviewer commented that running miles and miles in the Brooks Transcend 4 felt good
There were purchasers who were able to use this shoe for casual purposes and they stated that it remained supportive throughout
Many testers gave positive remarks about the supportive mid-sole of this model
The upper unit was able to retain a good fit and hold, noted a reviewer
The price is $10 lesser compared to the previous Transcend upon release
Outsole grip is superb on most surfaces, even in the rain
cons: Several women reviewers felt a significant drop in the arch support compared to the earlier model of this shoe
Despite the $10 difference compared to the earlier model, it is still quite expensive for many runners
It runs a little short in sizing, according to some reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort ride shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: After having issues with the Adrenaline 16 and 17's, I decided to give the Transcend a shot. What a difference!! These shoes have been excellent for running. Having about as flat as feet as you can have I was a little worried about changing shoes, no more! Just logged my 100th mile yesterday for the month of March.. No pain in my heels or legs from the comfort and support of these shoes. I was also a little concerned from going from a 12mm to 8mm heel drop, but after my first run knew I should have made the change a long time ago. Gearing up to run a Half Marathon in these this weekend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you pronate and have high arches I cannot recommend these enough
customer_reviews.text: If you pronate and have high arches I cannot recommend these enough. My chiropractor recommended this exact make/model of shoe for me since I was having bilateral lateral lower leg pain. He has competed in 4 Iron Man competitions so I trust his judgment when it comes to shoes. He was 100% right! This is the only athletic shoe I buy any more.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I had the Transcend 3s and they were great. My favorite ever. But buying a pair of these 4s was even better. They feel like they are made exactly for the shape of my feet. I have issues walking on the outside of my feet and to my knowledge this is one of he only shows out there designed to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Derek/Grace

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great if you need extra cushioning when you run; however, I've had the shoes for barely two months and use them to run on a treadmill only, the shoes started to fall apart already. Considering a hefty price tag of $140, I'd expect a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Orthotics fit better in New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Let's see if my heavy weight allows these shoes to hold up. Last pair in this series lasted 9 months before my knees starting hurting. I will buy again. I used to buy high end New Balance. Orthotics fit better in New Balance, but these shoes don't really require my orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Fla

customer_reviews.title: I'm a heavier guy and these work great for 5ks up to half marathons
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two pairs of Transcend 2, two pairs of 3, and now 4. I'm a heavier guy and these work great for 5ks up to half marathons. I generally replace them between 250 and 350 miles depending on how my knees and ankles feel after a long run.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Brooks transcends are the only shoes that I wear. The women’s sizes sell out quickly so I purchase the men’s shoe. Always available in the smaller sizes and generally on sale
customer_reviews.author: Pheon Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for helping to correct pronating gait
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Transcend 2s and 3s for my flat feet and the overpronation of my gait. The Transcend 4 shoes fit my feet better than the others and feel great. I use them with orthotic inserts made by Foot Solutions.
customer_reviews.author: RSASWFL

customer_reviews.title: Great Stability Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The Transcends were exactly what I hoped for! I have owned a couple of pair of Brooks Glycerins, and I needed to transition to more of a stability shoes with reasonable cushion due to my flat feet. The Transcends exceeded my expectations in every way! They were supportive and comfortable without too much guidance even on the first run.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & looks great. If you have very high instep & arches, the Ghost 10 maybe a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Trancend worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love these running shoes. These are my third pair. They feel comfortable and broken in right out of the box. I would suggest you go to a reputable running store to get fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great Running shoe, lots of support. They do run a little large compared to other past brook shoes I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shreve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe, but I love the Brooks line. Has plenty of support and cushion for longer training runs
customer_reviews.author: pnivens

customer_reviews.title: The red transcend 2fit the best until I got the black and blue transcend4
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 pair of transcends. The red transcend 2fit the best until I got the black and blue transcend4. These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever walked in. I ware a size 10 and the fit is perfect. I will be ordering another pair as I like to rotate my shoes. I wish Brooks would make an all black pair so I could wear them out for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like running on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Perfect for my running style. Light, flexible and cushioned. I tried some Mizuno Horizons but these absolutely blew them away
customer_reviews.author: ARDs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Has enough cushion to support running long distances! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe for walking and for jogging/running
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe for walking and for jogging/running. Performance is exactly what this 150 lb with slight pronation needed. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: halfmoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Just the right amount of support for my plantar fasciitis. Fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: H Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Fit perfectly and totally changed the way I run. Feels like you're running on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Paxton
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair on Brooks and my first Trascend 4. They really have a great cushion better than the 3
customer_reviews.author: Paxton2644

customer_reviews.title: Another solid version of the Transcend shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A great stability running shoe if you are looking for a little extra support and cushion. Another great Brooks running shoe!
customer_reviews.author: theActiveGuy.com

customer_reviews.title: Plush ride!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as expected, with a very roomy toe box, no break in required. Stability and arch support are a little less notable than my go-to shoe; the Brooks Adrenaline, but the Brooks Super DNA cushioning provides a very soft, comfortable ride, similar to Adidas boost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Comfortable, light, and seem to have good support/shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a pair if these a while back and liked them so much that I ordered these when they needed replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable 5mile run
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these, I got fitted for these at a running store a year ago. Can't beat this price! And really most importantly pain in my knees went away!
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Brooks is my brand of choice. I have a couple of pairs of Glycerin, that are super comfort, and this particular model of Transcend look and feel grat too
customer_reviews.author: Ram P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Less pain in legs after using these for my jogging.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brooks makes shoes for people who need the most comfort and stability based on their walking style and arch. I won't run with anything else. However, I do try the other brands and Brooks always comes out on top.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair went 1/2 size larger still too small, ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair went 1/2 size larger still too small, they are also narrow and squeeze my foot. I could not walk 3 miles had to stop extreme pain. Back to Assics
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hallgren

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe it looks and feels great ,well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bahre

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable line from Brooks. I experience a lot of heel slip. Will stick with my Adrenaline in the future.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: I have the transcendent 2 shoe and it seems like a much more stable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have the transcendent 2 shoe and it seems like a much more stable shoe ... I thought the 5 would be as well. Overall still a Great Shoe
customer_reviews.author: Jace Gates

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I never had a running shoe as comfortable as these one.
customer_reviews.author: Luis  Peña

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a pair of Brooks I didn't love.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort and fit. Like it so much I purchased another pair in a different color. Will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fantastic and comfortable. Exactly what my feet needed for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really stable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has great cushioning, it holds the foot well in its place and it feels real comfortable, it is good for longer runs. I had a severe case of plantar fasciitis, after therapy and getting special inserts, I have been able to get back to my regular runs without adverse effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlereview50

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoe! One of the best shoes I have worn in the past five years that does not exacerbate my planter fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mark O. Scott

The Trancend is also perfectly for runners an Orthopedische insert will need.
